name: Cryptids
author: ShadowGov Team
description: X-Files deluxe parody. 300 cards. Government vs Truth.

cards.name: Men in Black Sweep
cards.text: Opponent loses 7 IP. If Truth > 60%, lose 10 instead.

cards.name: Weather Machine Alpha
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Project Grand Mandela
cards.text: Set Truth to 15%. Opponent skips next Action. Draw 1.
cards.flavor: Remember when you thought you remembered?

cards.name: Chemtrail Deployment
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Area 51 Security
cards.text: Immune to next MEDIA card. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Fake Alien Invasion
cards.flavor: War of the Worlds 2: Electric Boogaloo

cards.name: Disinformation Bureau
cards.text: All MEDIA cards cost 1 less. Truth -10%.
cards.flavor: Truth is whatever we say it is.

cards.name: Bigfoot Suit Factory
cards.text: Truth -12%. Next ZONE card costs 2 less.

cards.name: Mothman Relocation Program
cards.text: Add 5 Pressure to target state. Truth -8%.

cards.name: Lake Monster Drainage
cards.flavor: Just a big log. Really big log.

cards.name: Deniability Protocols
cards.flavor: We have no knowledge of these protocols.

cards.name: Black Helicopters
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Truth -6%.

cards.name: Cryptozoology Department
cards.text: ZONE cards cost 1 less. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Flatwoods Incident
cards.flavor: Just a barn owl in a tree.

cards.name: Hopkinsville Goblins
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Time Travel Bureau
cards.text: Take another turn after this one.

cards.name: Interdimensional Gate
cards.flavor: Portal to the shadow realm opened.

cards.name: Yeti Expedition Hoax
cards.text: Truth -12%. Add 2 Pressure to any snowy state.
cards.flavor: Just a guy in a white suit.

cards.name: Cattle Mutilation Labs
cards.text: Truth -10%. Add 3 Pressure to any rural state.

cards.name: Crop Circle Artists Guild
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target agricultural state.
cards.flavor: We pay well for good geometric work.

cards.name: Moon-Eyed People Census
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to any Appalachian state.

cards.name: Giant Octopus Cover-up
cards.text: Truth -15%. Add 2 Pressure to any coastal state.

cards.name: Invisible Aircraft Project
cards.text: Truth -25%. All ZONE cards cost 2 less this turn.

cards.name: Greys Employment Program
cards.text: All ATTACK cards cost 1 less. Gain 1 IP per turn.

cards.name: Reality Anchor Array
cards.text: Truth cannot change for 2 turns. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dimension X Portal
cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to target state. Opponent loses 2 IP.

cards.name: Cryptid Rehabilitation Center
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to target state. Truth -5%.

cards.name: Neuralyzer Deployment
cards.text: Opponent discards all cards, draws 3 new ones.

cards.name: Shadow Government HQ
cards.text: All cards cost 2 less. Gain 3 IP per turn.

cards.name: Holographic UFO Display
cards.text: Truth -12%. Add 2 Pressure to any state.

cards.name: Cryptid Breeding Program
cards.text: Truth -15%. Create 2 random ZONE cards in hand.

cards.name: False Flag Cryptid Attack
cards.text: Opponent loses 10 IP and 1 state. Truth -25%.
cards.flavor: Fake cryptid attack justifies extreme measures.

cards.name: Extraterrestrial Non-Disclosure Treaty
cards.text: Truth cannot exceed 50%. Draw 1 card per turn.

cards.name: Quantum Bigfoot Experiment
cards.text: Truth -10%. Gain ability to play cards from discard.

cards.name: Interdimensional Customs
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cosmic Horror Containment
cards.text: Block all ATTACK cards this turn. Truth -10%.
cards.flavor: Some things must stay locked away.

cards.name: Reptilian Shapeshifter Agent
cards.text: Opponent loses 5 IP. Gain 1 IP per turn.

cards.name: Psy-Ops Division
cards.text: MEDIA cards cost 1 less. Opponent loses 1 IP per turn.

cards.name: Underground Bunker Network
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to target state. Gain 2 IP.

cards.name: Reality Distortion Field
cards.text: Truth cannot increase for 2 turns. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cryptid DNA Database
cards.text: Truth -15%. Create 1 random ATTACK card in hand.

cards.name: Bigfoot Expedition
cards.text: Add 3 Pressure to forested state. Truth +5%.

cards.name: Chupacabra Sighting Report
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to southwestern state. Truth +8%.

cards.name: Lake Monster Sonar Evidence
cards.text: Truth +10%. Add 2 Pressure to any lake state.
cards.flavor: Sonar doesn't lie about what's down there.

cards.name: Area 51 Infiltration
cards.text: Truth +25%. Opponent loses 8 IP and 1 state.

cards.name: Jersey Devil Hunt
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to New Jersey. Truth +5%.

cards.name: Phantom Kangaroo Tracking Network
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to any midwestern state.

cards.name: Hopkinsville Goblins Testimony
cards.flavor: The Kelly family tells their story.

cards.name: Hollow Earth Expedition
cards.text: Add 5 Pressure to any state. Truth +15%.

cards.name: UFO Crash Retrieval Team
cards.flavor: Recovery team beats government to the site.

cards.name: Interdimensional Portal Research
cards.text: Truth +10%. Create 1 random card in hand.

cards.name: Phantom Black Dog Network
cards.text: Add 2 Pressure to any rural state.

cards.name: Yeti Hair Analysis
cards.flavor: DNA doesn't match any known primate.

cards.name: Dover Demon Witness Testimony
cards.flavor: Teenagers don't lie about this stuff.

cards.text: Truth +30%. Create 2 random cards in hand.

cards.flavor: Ghost hunters and cryptid seekers unite.

cards.name: Multidimensional Gateway
cards.text: Truth +35%. Create 3 random cards in hand.

cards.text: Truth +25%. Opponent loses 8 IP and 1 state.

cards.name: Holographic Universe Theory
cards.text: Truth +8%. All cards cost 1 less this turn.

cards.name: Cryptid DNA Evidence Database
cards.text: Truth +18%. Create 1 random ZONE card in hand.

cards.name: Crystal Wi-Fi Chakra Network
cards.text: All cards cost 1 less. Truth +3% per turn.

cards.text: Add 4 Pressure to any forested state. Truth +10%.
